name: TCPPackLoader
short_description:
The program loads your TCP-based server simulating up to 10000
socket connections.
OS:Android
Program works over GPRS and WiFi.
This can help you find out how many connections could your server 
handle and also what is the status of the network used .

Just Enter:

IP address of the server
Port of the server
Maximum number of test socket conections .
Server load-this is the slider position -it determines delay (in msec) 
between each socket connection.Position 0.0s means maximum load- no 
delay between connections.
Of course you need to enable internet access on your android device.

Press "Start Test" and test begins.

Notes:
Please be patient-with 10000 socket connections the test could take 
hours.
Please use button "Quit" always if you want to close the program.

After test ends the button "Show Statistics" will be enabled.Press it 
to see data from the test.
summary: The program loads any TCP-based server simulating up to 10000 sockets
